item.title: [Help]Compiler[Help] *URGENT*
item.dc:creator: @pure_wc1994 pure wc1994
item.description:
@pure_wc1994 wrote:

[quote=“Blain2007, post:7, topic:236008”]its saying it cant find java

where it says 1.6.0_07
thats jdk

so if urs is jdk 6 update 5 u put 1.6.0_05[/quote]

I know what JDK is and I’ve set my PATH’S and CLASSPATH’S to JDK 6u7 so it must be right and also I’ve installed JDK 6u7 and when the compiler first got downloaded it was JDK 6u6 so I changed it to JDK 6u7. I don’t know what’s wrong. It’s really @#%$ me off now.

item.title: [Help]Compiler[Help] *URGENT*
item.dc:creator: @pure_wc1994 pure wc1994
item.description:
@pure_wc1994 wrote:

Ermm, I really want to know what’s happening

[quote=“Blain2007, post:4, topic:236008”]Well usually it means it is working, but in your case, maybe you should try editing the script to:

@echo off title HygpScape Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac" -source 1.5 -target 1.5 -classpath . -d bin *.java -g pause[/quote]

When I put that in the script it says

javac: file not found: *.java Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options Press any key to continue . . .

Any more ideas?

Read full topic

item.title: [Help]Compiler[Help] *URGENT*
item.dc:creator: @pure_wc1994 pure wc1994
item.description:
@pure_wc1994 wrote:

@echo off cd ../src "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/players/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/players/update/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/players/items/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/players/combat/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/io/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/io/packets/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/net/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/util/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/world/mapdata/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/world/items/*.java pause

That’s my compiler for the 508 source. But it takes age then eventually it says;

Press any key to continue . . .

Read full topic
